title: My Templates
description: Create and manage custom templates to efficiently optimize your resume

loginRequired.title: Login Required
loginRequired.description: You need to log in with your Manus account to use this feature

createDialog.title: Create New Template
createDialog.description: Create a custom prompt template that you can reuse
createDialog.namePlaceholder: e.g., Template for Foreign IT Companies
createDialog.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose and features of this template
createDialog.promptNote: ※ Use {{resumeText}} and {{jobDescription}} to automatically embed input content

editDialog.title: Edit Template
editDialog.promptNote: ※ Use {{resumeText}} and {{jobDescription}} to automatically embed input content

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
